tool_description: Computes comprehensive risk metrics including volatility, Value-at-Risk, maximum drawdown, and Sharpe ratios from return data.

return_symbols.description: Symbols for which to calculate risk metrics

risk_free_rate.description: Risk-free rate for Sharpe ratio calculation

error_messages: Invalid confidence level: Must be between 0.90 and 0.99.
Insufficient data: Need at least 30 return observations for reliable risk calculations.
Invalid lookback window: Must be at least 30 and not exceed available data length.
Unknown metrics: Supported metrics are [volatility, var, cvar, sharpe, sortino, max_drawdown, skewness, kurtosis].
Missing return data: Return data not available for specified symbols.
usage: Provide symbols with calculated returns and specify risk calculation preferences. Returns comprehensive risk metrics for each asset.

symbols_analyzed.description: Symbols for which risk metrics were calculated

metrics_calculated.description: List of risk metrics that were computed

analysis_period.description: Time period covered by the risk analysis

warnings.description: Any warnings about data quality or calculation limitations
